ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (Off-Topic) Some advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have Everlore book marked but think that the quality of their search facility is below average.  When you search you get a bazillion hit of bits and pieces
ygData.messageBody:
I have Everlore book marked but think that the quality of their search
facility is below average. When you search you get a bazillion hit of bits
and pieces and have to dig thru that to find the meat you want. I would
hate to see your quality reference get that same treatment.

So, I would say - keep things where they are. Working for free for your self
is one thing but to work for free for someone else (Everlore who wont host
your banners but get paid for their own) is something else entirely. Kinda
like fool me once shame on you, fool me twice shame on me.

Sylly

> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> I was (asked? offered?) a place on EverLore.com for the EQ Glossary. I've

> it for me - I just need some unbiased input here - Do I take the Lady or
> the Tiger?
>
>
> Talies the Wanderer
